participant_2.background:
I like watching war documentaries.
I volunteer at a soup kitchen.
Cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
I was poor growing up.
I am a retired gym teacher.

content.text: Hello!
Hello there!
I'm a construction worker and I love building houses.
That's so cool! I'm retired but I used to be a gym teacher.
Oh, that's interesting! Did you like it?
I loved it! I loved working with kids and helping them get healthy.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite things about building houses?
I love the feeling of seeing a project come to life. I also love working with my hands and seeing the results of my work.
That makes sense! It sounds like you're really passionate about your work.
I am! I'm really proud of what I do and I love being able to help people build their dream homes.
That's great! I'm sure your customers appreciate your work.
I hope so! I always try to do my best and I'm always happy to answer any questions or concerns they have.
That's really good to hear. I'm sure your customers are lucky to have you.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what are some of your favorite projects that you've worked on?

I have a lot of favorite projects, but one that really stands out is a house I built for a family who had lost their home in a fire. It was really rewarding to be able to help them rebuild their lives.
That's amazing! I'm sure that was a very special project for you.
It was. It's always great to be able to help people, but it's especially rewarding when you can help people who have been through a difficult time.
I can imagine. I'm sure that was a really meaningful experience for you.
It was. It's one of the things that I love most about my job.
